channel.title: Machine Learning on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: DAPO: An Open-Source LLM Reinforcement Learning System at Scale
item.description: DAPO: Open-sources a LLM reinforcement learning system that achieves SOTA AIME scores, fostering reproducible research at scale.

item.title: Frac-Connections: Fractional Extension of Hyper-Connections
item.description: Frac-Connections: An efficient alternative to Hyper-Connections that divides hidden states into fractions.

item.title: Charting and Navigating Hugging Face's Model Atlas
item.description: Navigating millions of models is hard. This paper charts Hugging Face, revealing model relationships and attribute predictions.

item.title: Kolmogorov-Arnold Attention: Is Learnable Attention Better For Vision Transformers?
item.description: KArAt: Can Learnable Attention Beat Standard Attention in Vision Transformers?

item.title: Transformers without Normalization
item.description: Transformers can achieve state-of-the-art performance without normalization layers via Dynamic Tanh (DyT), offering a simpler and more efficient alternative.

item.title: Optimizing Test-Time Compute via Meta Reinforcement Fine-Tuning
item.description: LLMs can now reason more efficiently!

item.title: BlackGoose Rimer: Harnessing RWKV-7 as a Simple yet Superior Replacement for Transformers in Large-Scale Time Series Modeling
item.description: Rimer: RWKV-7 empowers superior time series modeling, offering a simple yet effective alternative to Transformers with fewer parameters.

item.title: Benchmarking AI Models in Software Engineering: A Review, Search Tool, and Enhancement Protocol
item.description: This paper reviews AI4SE benchmarks, introduces BenchScout for benchmark discovery, and proposes BenchFrame for benchmark enhancement, demonstrated via HumanEvalNext.

item.title: LoRACode: LoRA Adapters for Code Embeddings
item.description: LoRACode enhances code embeddings using LoRA, achieving SOTA in code retrieval with minimal computational cost.

item.title: KodCode: A Diverse, Challenging, and Verifiable Synthetic Dataset for Coding
item.description: KODCODE: A new synthetic coding dataset with verified solutions and tests, enabling state-of-the-art performance for coding LLMs.

item.title: Language Models can Self-Improve at State-Value Estimation for Better Search
item.description: Self-Taught Lookahead improves LLM search via self-supervision, matching costly methods at a fraction of the compute!

item.title: Learning from Failures in Multi-Attempt Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Multi-attempt RL refines LLMs, significantly boosting accuracy on math tasks by enabling them to learn from failures through user feedback.

item.title: MultiAgentBench: Evaluating the Collaboration and Competition of LLM agents
item.description: MultiAgentBench: A benchmark for evaluating collaboration and competition in LLM agents across diverse, interactive scenarios with novel metrics and protocols.

item.title: Identifying Sensitive Weights via Post-quantization Integral
item.description: PQI: Accurately identify sensitive weights in post-quantization to enhance LLM compression & performance!

item.title: SoS1: O1 and R1-Like Reasoning LLMs are Sum-of-Square Solvers
item.description: SoS1: O1 and R1-Like Reasoning LLMs are Sum-of-Square Solvers.

item.title: OneRec: Unifying Retrieve and Rank with Generative Recommender and Iterative Preference Alignment
item.description: OneRec: A unified generative model that replaces the traditional retrieve-and-rank strategy, significantly improving recommendation quality in real-world scenarios.

item.title: Self-rewarding correction for mathematical reasoning
item.description: LLM can now reason and correct itself using self-generated data, achieving performance on par with external reward models!

item.title: Lean and Mean: Decoupled Value Policy Optimization with Global Value Guidance
item.description: DVPO: A lean RLHF framework that decouples value & policy optimization with global value guidance, cutting GPU use by 40% and training time by 35%.

item.title: Stable-SPAM: How to Train in 4-Bit More Stably than 16-Bit Adam
item.description: Stable-SPAM stabilizes 4-bit LLM training, outperforming Adam.

item.title: MONSTER: Monash Scalable Time Series Evaluation Repository
item.description: MONSTER: Large datasets for time series classification!

item.title: One-step Diffusion Models with $f$-Divergence Distribution Matching
item.description: f-distill: One-step diffusion models through f-divergence minimization, outperforming reverse-KL with better mode coverage and lower variance.

item.title: TAG: A Decentralized Framework for Multi-Agent Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning
item.description: TAG: A decentralized framework for scalable multi-agent hierarchical reinforcement learning.

item.title: LLM-based User Profile Management for Recommender System
item.description: PURE: LLM-driven user profile management boosts recommendation by harnessing user reviews for personalized insights while tackling token limits. PURE enhances LLMs for better recommendations.

item.title: Logic-RL: Unleashing LLM Reasoning with Rule-Based Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Logic-RL unlocks LLM reasoning via rule-based reinforcement learning, generalizing to math problems after training on logic puzzles.

item.title: MLGym: A New Framework and Benchmark for Advancing AI Research Agents
item.description: MLGYM: A new framework & benchmark to advance AI Research Agents

item.title: ReQFlow: Rectified Quaternion Flow for Efficient and High-Quality Protein Backbone Generation
item.description: ReQFlow: Efficiently generate high-quality protein backbones with rectified quaternion flow, outperforming existing methods in speed and designability.

item.title: S*: Test Time Scaling for Code Generation
item.description: S*: Hybrid test-time scaling for code generation, boosting both coverage and selection accuracy.

item.title: UPCORE: Utility-Preserving Coreset Selection for Balanced Unlearning
item.description: UPCORE reduces unintended unlearning effects via coreset selection, balancing knowledge removal and utility preservation.

item.title: AdaptiveStep: Automatically Dividing Reasoning Step through Model Confidence
item.description: AdaptiveStep: Divides reasoning steps automatically through model confidence, enhancing PRM training & performance.

item.title: Noise May Contain Transferable Knowledge: Understanding Semi-supervised Heterogeneous Domain Adaptation from an Empirical Perspective
item.description: Unveiling the surprising potential of noise: transferable knowledge in semi-supervised heterogeneous domain adaptation (SHDA).

item.title: Eager Updates For Overlapped Communication and Computation in DiLoCo
item.description: Eager updates drastically speed up training massive language models by cleverly overlapping communication and computation in DiLoCo, achieving near-optimal performance even with low bandwidth.

item.title: NExT-Mol: 3D Diffusion Meets 1D Language Modeling for 3D Molecule Generation
item.description: NExT-Mol: Combines 1D language models with 3D diffusion for molecule generation, achieving state-of-the-art performance and validity.

item.title: S$^2$R: Teaching LLMs to Self-verify and Self-correct via Reinforcement Learning
item.description: S2R: Teaches LLMs to self-verify and self-correct, boosting reasoning with efficient reinforcement learning.

item.title: Small Models Struggle to Learn from Strong Reasoners
item.description: Small language models struggle to learn complex reasoning from large models, but a novel ‘Mix Distillation’ method balances complexity for effective capability transfer.

item.title: Thinking Preference Optimization
item.description: ThinkPO improves LLM reasoning by preferring longer CoT, boosting performance without new data.

item.title: Towards Data-Efficient Pretraining for Atomic Property Prediction
item.description: High-quality, task-relevant pretraining data surpasses large-scale pretraining in atomic property prediction, achieving comparable performance at 1/24th the computational cost.

item.title: AdaPTS: Adapting Univariate Foundation Models to Probabilistic Multivariate Time Series Forecasting
item.description: AdaPTS effectively adapts pre-trained univariate time series models to probabilistic multivariate forecasting, improving accuracy and uncertainty quantification.

item.title: Memory, Benchmark & Robots: A Benchmark for Solving Complex Tasks with Reinforcement Learning
item.description: MIKASA, a new benchmark for memory-intensive reinforcement learning, provides a unified framework for evaluating memory capabilities in diverse scenarios, including complex robotic manipulation tasks.

item.title: Can this Model Also Recognize Dogs? Zero-Shot Model Search from Weights
item.description: ProbeLog: Zero-shot model search directly from weights, boosting efficiency and accuracy!

item.title: Agency Is Frame-Dependent
item.description: Agency, a key concept in AI, is shown to be relative to the observer’s perspective (frame-dependent), challenging traditional binary definitions and necessitating a more nuanced approach for AI system…

item.title: ACECODER: Acing Coder RL via Automated Test-Case Synthesis
item.description: AceCoder uses automated test-case synthesis to create a large-scale dataset for training reward models, enabling effective reinforcement learning to significantly boost code generation model performan…

item.title: Improving Transformer World Models for Data-Efficient RL
item.description: AI agents now master complex tasks with improved Transformer World Models, achieving a new state-of-the-art in data-efficient reinforcement learning.

item.title: Weak-to-Strong Diffusion with Reflection
item.description: W2SD: A novel framework boosts diffusion model quality by using the difference between weak and strong models to refine sampling trajectories, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: Streaming DiLoCo with overlapping communication: Towards a Distributed Free Lunch
item.description: Streaming DiLoCo achieves two orders of magnitude bandwidth reduction in billion-scale parameter LLM training by synchronizing parameter subsets sequentially, overlapping communication with computatio…

item.title: SRMT: Shared Memory for Multi-agent Lifelong Pathfinding
item.description: SRMT: Shared Recurrent Memory Transformer boosts multi-agent coordination by implicitly sharing information via a global memory, significantly outperforming baselines in complex pathfinding tasks.

item.title: Graph Generative Pre-trained Transformer
item.description: G2PT: a novel graph generative model using sequence-based representation and transformer decoder, achieving superior performance on diverse tasks.

item.title: Just a Simple Transformation is Enough for Data Protection in Vertical Federated Learning
item.description: Simple tweak, big privacy win: MLP-based architectures boost data protection in federated learning.

item.title: A New Federated Learning Framework Against Gradient Inversion Attacks
item.description: HyperFL: A new federated learning framework breaking the direct connection between shared parameters and private data, effectively defending against gradient inversion attacks while maintaining favora…

item.title: PIG: Physics-Informed Gaussians as Adaptive Parametric Mesh Representations
item.description: Physics-Informed Gaussians (PIGs) revolutionize PDE solving by using adaptive, learnable Gaussian functions for superior accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: Best of Both Worlds: Advantages of Hybrid Graph Sequence Models
item.description: Hybrid Graph Sequence Model (GSM++) outperforms existing models by using hierarchical sequences and a hybrid architecture of Transformers and recurrent models, effectively capturing both local and glo…

item.title: Improving the detection of technical debt in Java source code with an enriched dataset
item.description: Enriched dataset TESORO improves technical debt detection by combining self-admitted comments and Java source code, advancing state-of-the-art models.

item.title: SambaMixer: State of Health Prediction of Li-ion Batteries using Mamba State Space Models
item.description: SambaMixer: A novel state-space model accurately predicts Li-ion battery health using efficient Mamba architecture and innovative resampling techniques.
